questions.text: What is the name of the King of the heavens?
When did the museum acquire the Diya of Bharata?
What does the Mahabharata tell the story of?
questions.answer: The war between the 5 Pandavas and their 100 cousins

questions.text: One character has acrophobia. What is this?
How do the gods claim their child?
questions.answer: They save them from being killed by golden arrow tips

questions.text: What are demons traditionally called?
How does Mini beat her clone?
questions.answer: Through a long discussion over what the fastest thing in the world is

questions.text: What is the name of the character who killed his wife because he was so obsessed with his image?
What is apparently a common phrase used by people in Aru's state when speaking to someone you don't like?
questions.answer: "It's not like I'm hiding cloven hooves," or "Bless your heart."
